attributes.action: Prevent Prime Ministers  who have failed the country claiming a pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I firmly believe that any Prime Minister who clearly enjoys a fine life at the tax payers expense should be liable if the policies they create do not work. If in failing to work they cause difficuties for the electorate they should be liable. Just like the Govenment who expected Sir Fred Godwin to pay for his failures by forgoing his pension so should the Prime Minister whos policies allowed and helped the situation to occur.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
